contentrichtext.text: {{expand Dutch|Geldermalsen (gemeente)|date=September 2012}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Geldermalsen | image_skyline = Geldermalsen station.jpg | image_caption = Geldermalsen train station | image_flag = Flag of Geldermalsen.svg | flag_size = 120x100px | flag_alt = Flag of Geldermalsen | image_seal = | seal_size = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Coat of arms of Geldermalsen.svg | shield_size = 120x100px | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Geldermalsen |image_map = LocatieGeldermalsen.png |mapsize = 250px |latd=51|latm=53|lats=|latNS=N |longd=5|longm=18|longs=|longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[Gelderland]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 101.67 |area_land_km2 = 99.70 |area_water_km2 = 1.97 |population_as_of = 1 January 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 26241 |population_density_km2 = 263 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 }} '''Geldermalsen''' ({{pronunciation|Nl-Geldermalsen.ogg}}) is a [[municipality]] and a town in the western [[Netherlands]]. The municipality of Geldermalsen was formed on the 1 January 1978 when former municipalities [[Beesd]], [[Buurmalsen]], [[Deil]] and Geldermalsen were joined. The new municipality with approximately 10.173 hectares (100 x 100 m2) is one of the largest municipalities in the Western Betuwe. On 1 January 2008 the municipality had 26,295 inhabitants. They all live in one of the eleven villages that form Geldermalsen. ==Geography== The river [[Linge]] flows through Geldermalsen. ===Population centres=== * [[Acquoy]] * [[Beesd]] * [[Buurmalsen]] * [[Deil]] * [[Enspijk]] * [[Geldermalsen (town)|Geldermalsen]] * [[Gellicum]] * [[Meteren]] * [[Rhenoy]] * [[Rumpt]] * [[Tricht]] == Demographics == Demographics of Geldermalsen, 2010: * [[Dutch people|Dutch]]: 91.7% * [[Black people|Black]]: 0.9% * [[White people|European]]: 4.5% * [[Arab people|Arabs]]: 1.4% * Other non-Western: 1.4%:<ref>[http://www.zorgatlas.nl/beinvloedende-factoren/demografie/etniciteit/niet-westerse-allochtonen-per-gemeente-2010-2040/]</ref> ==Gallery== <gallery> File:Verkeersbrug Geldermalsen - Buurmalsen.JPG|The road bridge between Buurmalsen and Geldermalsen File:Linge Geldermalsen.jpg|Linge river File:Geldermalsen - Watermolen.jpg|Windmill in Geldermalsen File:Toren Hervormde Kerk Geldermalsen.jpg|Tower of the Reformed Church in the center of Geldermalsen File:Koor Hervormde Kerk Geldermalsen.jpg|Choir of the Reformed Church File:Geldermalsen - Koppelsedijk 2 - Villa "Lingbeek".JPG|The villa was built in 1929 by architect A. H. Wegerif </gallery> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category}} *[http://www.geldermalsen.nl Official Website] *[http://www.plattegronden.nl/gemeentegeldermalsen/ Map] {{Geographic location | Centre = Geldermalsen | North = [[Culemborg]] | Northeast = [[Buren]] | East = [[Tiel]] | South = [[Neerijnen]] | Southwest = [[Lingewaal]] | West = [[Leerdam]] ([[South Holland|ZH]]) }} {{Gelderland Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of Gelderland]] [[Category:Populated places in Gelderland]] {{Gelderland-geo-stub}}
